alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 6:15AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Humboldt County through 645 AM PST... At 614 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over McKinleyville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arcata, Westhaven-Moonstone, McKinleyville, Blue Lake, Arcata Arpt and Fieldbrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior
